website_summaries.verdict: Encased delivers a stable, well-functioning unit for those who want a charging dock for their iPhone without the frills.
pros: The base manages to be sturdy while taking up almost no space
The unit comes fully assembled so there is no threading of cables on delivery as required by other similar units
The base adjusts to fit most cases
cons: While the unit will charge all lightning connector phones, it is designed for the iPhone 7, and might not be as stable with heavier phones

customer_reviews.title: Best Dock on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching high and low for a decent dock for my iPhone 7 Plus. During the course of my search I've come across 2 types of docks. Either A) the lightning cable doesn't reach the charging port with a case on it, or B) it doesn't have any back support so that the phone is being held up by the lightning cable alone. This dock is exactly what I was hoping for. Between the height adjustable lightning plug and the angle being adjustable as well, I couldn't be happier. A+ in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin New

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: Update 4/7/18 - completely stopped working. My phone doesn’t recognize the charger. I have the iPhone X. I have to dock and undock it several times before it will register as “charging”. A couple of mornings I woke up and it wasn’t 100% charged.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love this charging dock
customer_reviews.text: Love this charging dock!! The base is heavy and of good quality. It charges my phone super-fast. It has a stand to hold the phone up so the charging pin won't break off. Great product! Considering purchasing a second one for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and quality lead to premature failure
customer_reviews.text: The stand did not work well. The lightning connector is adjustable up and down by spinning a wheel. The problem is that the connector is not sturdy and just pushes back down into the dock stand. This prevents you from charging. There were many nights my wife thought it was plugged in, and woke up to find her phone battery drained. After about 200 uses, it completely broke and has no resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: I like these lightning phone chargers
customer_reviews.text: If you keep your iPhone on your desk, I think this is ideal. The height of the lightning connector is screw-adjustable to compensate for the thickness of any case you might have on your phone, and it's not so rigidly mounted that it completely supports the phone. Instead, the phone leans against a plastic backstop that keeps it at a viewable angle. I like this dock so much that when I discontinued my office landline and replaced it with another phone, I ordered a second one for that phone. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good standby charging stand.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect as our bedside charging station. connection adjusts from deep to shallow to fit the cases that we have on our phones. Cord could be a bit longer but we have usb ports on our adjustable bed so we can just use those instead of the wall plug. I guess if I wanted to use the phone horizontal while charging I could not so that may be something that can be offered int he future. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BCTyler

customer_reviews.title: Great charging dock if you don't have a protective case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband, but unfortunately, the reviews I read from individuals who claimed it could be used even with a case were incorrect. My husband has a very thin protective case on his iPhone 7 and it just doesn't allow the phone to sit on the charging pin. My iPhone has a similar case so we can't use it and sadly it has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.Zwit

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Have it next to bed to charge phone. Love the adjustable lightening connector for charging. I have a case on my phone and being able to increase the height setting of the connector is a life saver. You do need to pay attention when placing your phone on the connector. Place your phone straight down onto the connector then let the phone lay back against the rest. I could see if you come in at an angle you could damage the connector. I like it, glad I got it and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: back2rota

customer_reviews.title: Functional Good Looking Stand
customer_reviews.text: I love that it adjusts the height just right so that the base rests on the bottom and the back against the backrest with a positive connection. It is just the right weight and size so it is functional without being obtrusive. I'd give it five stars if I could insert the iPHONE without looking but by feel. I am hard to please. I also appreciate the extra lightning cable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term not a permanent solution
customer_reviews.text: I was pregnant when I purchased this last year and didn’t want to climb under my desk to plug my phone in to charge so this seemed like a great solution. It worked great at first but now a year later it rarely will connect to my phone, as if the charging plug isn’t going into the port all the way or something.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Burke

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The charger stopped working after literally one use. It wouldn’t charge the next night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy After Day 1
customer_reviews.text: I got my first full day of use out of this dock today and am very pleased so far. I have a very slim case on my 7+ and I tried a different dock last week that just didn't work, even though the case only adds less than 1mm to the bottom of the phone. Had I seen this dock initially I definitely would have ordered it. The adjustability works great and the adhesive on the bottom allows for easy removal of the phone without having to use another hand to hold the base down. In short, I highly recommend this dock!
customer_reviews.author: LewDog

customer_reviews.title: Charges fast
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far. It charges fast. I had a wireless charger before this. I had it for a week then the receiver tab that plugs into my phone broke off and I had to take it to have it taken out. It was my Mother’s Day gift. I’m glad that the rep, Lee recommended this one. Permanent connector. No need to worry about pulling on it. I am a disabled adult with CP. I can do it with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Lani Halpin

customer_reviews.title: Easier charge
customer_reviews.text: I thought you would just set the phone into the charger but you still have to plug it into a connection, but it is still easier and quicker than connecting the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Country Gal

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase - will not work
customer_reviews.text: Don't purchase this product. This product worked fine for a while and then all of a sudden it began to malfunction. From what I can determine this product never got the Apple Inc. approval and so it does not work anymore. Too bad.because it was very useful up until it stopped working all together.
customer_reviews.author: Happy  customer

customer_reviews.title: Skip it.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. While it looks nice and is constructed well...it’s nearly impossible to dock your iPhone to it. You almost always miss and have to hold it up and visually align. Skip it as a cord is easier!! Trust me...I have two of these and wish I didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice not having to find a cord every time you go to plug in your phone. It took a little getting used to trying to line up the hole with the charging port, but now that I’ve done it a few times it’s easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This needs to be redesigned to have USB-C instead of Micro-USB for fast charging...
customer_reviews.text: The cord connector at the back of this charger need to fitted with USB-C adapter instead of the existing Micro-USB. I needed to buy an adapter "USB C to Micro USB Adapter, (4-Pack) Type C Female to Micro USB Male Convert Connector Support Charge & Data Sync Compatible" Item Model Number 8541672328 in Amazon to make this a fast charger and connect it to Anker B8172011 and an Anker iQ Charger.
customer_reviews.author: 888esales

customer_reviews.title: Why, why, why?
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to have an upright docking station for my IPhone, especially one that slides so easily on my desk. So why does the phone stop charging after a few minutes, leaving it impossible to get it fully charged? A competitor's dock doesn't do that; it charges the phone to 100% of capacity.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Works good very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the stand i bought it for my mom who has a iPhone seven. However she has her phone in the largest Ottoerbox cover I’ve ever seen in my life, so it takes a few try’s to get it lined up. The product it’s self tho works awesome and is very convenient. Just put it on the night stand at night and don’t have to worry about where your charger is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and the adjustment for connector height is very slick
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the fence with this one. It looks nice and the adjustment for connector height is very slick. It fits both my elago slide case and my wife's bulkier 5 Below case. It's just too damn hard to get your phone on there without picking it up and doing it at eye level. My belkin dock was much better and I'm likely going to return this and just get another belkin dock.
customer_reviews.author: Whitey in PA

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived as promised. It's so easy to use & charges my phone quick. I like that It can be stood up & easily read whatever pops up.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie W.

customer_reviews.title: It Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 7's connector has become loose. I was having an issue with charging the battery during the night, and I overslept one morning. Since I started using this, I haven't had any failure during the night.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Very very useless has a tip on the base that you have to plug the phone into very hard to use all the time. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Babbitt

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: This charger is great. I have one on my nightstand, in my home office and at my work office for a quick charge. Charges pretty quickly and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lindlia

customer_reviews.title: It's a simple docking station for charging iPhone 7
customer_reviews.text: It's a charging docking station for my iPhone 7. Works just fine and I'm quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Juno

customer_reviews.title: I have had it a little while and it worked great and now nothing
customer_reviews.text: It will not work ! I have had it a little while and it worked great and now nothing! I need to know what to do!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rowell

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for my daughter who ruins charging cords. Now she docks her phone.

customer_reviews.title: will not work with lifeproof case
customer_reviews.text: If case has much thickness it probably will not work unless you take the case off.

customer_reviews.title: May be ok without case on phone
customer_reviews.text: Not really easy to use especially if you have a case on your phone and who wants to make your phone out of the case every time you charge it?
customer_reviews.author: jax-UT

customer_reviews.title: Great product to charge my phone and not have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my nightstand. Great product to charge my phone and not have to search for the cable every night.
customer_reviews.author: RJ B.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product, but I purchased this to be placedat ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but I purchased this to be placedat my bed side. With the product not coming with a plug for an outlet, you have to keep it connected to your computer in order for it to work. I purchased an adapter so that I could use a plug and keep it at my bedside. If you are purchasing this product to use in a wall outlet, be sure to purchase the plug adapter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Great charger!
customer_reviews.text: This bedside charger is fast enough once you get the IPhone 7 connected.the problem is getting it connected. I have to remove my protective case completely to put it on the charger. No problem. It works!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This docking station works with every iPhone 8 case I have. Before this case I had to remove most of the cases to work in my previous docking station which was a definite hassle! My wife liked it so much we now have 2. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Theadore B.

customer_reviews.title: Remember to remove cellphone cover before charging
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Charges , easy to use just have to remember to remove the cover off cell phone before charging. I’m very pleased with this purchase and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe that a generic 'charger/stand' is a good idea for the iphone. Poorly made fitting for the connection.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Works good..
customer_reviews.text: Works good....once I can get it on there. It says its supposed to be easy to put your phone on but I find myself fighting with it sometimes or having to pick up the base to align it to the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mastiff Mom

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in July and was working fine until this week. The little piece that sticks up that you connect your iPhone to (bottom piece) sunk into the dock. You cant charge the phone. I did notice there is a piece that you can turn to lower or raise the dock but that does not work. Disappointed that this only lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great to have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk at work since we can not plug things up under the desk and nothing against this but it still didn’t help there and it’s solely the type of computers we use. However I put it beside my bed and absolutely love it there! It helps me so much with browsing now! I give it 10/10 and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised with my iPhone 7 that has a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised with my iPhone 7 that has a slim case. Only two complaints are that it does not include a charger plug, only a USB cable and that it's not quite as heavy as it could be which would make taking the phone out easier.
customer_reviews.author: JP Toto

customer_reviews.title: It's an effective charging device.
customer_reviews.text: The charger is what I expected. The quality seems good and it's easy to use. It would be better if you could just lay the phone flat on the charger without having to stand it up and place it on the charging point, but for the price I think I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: John Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!!! Sits on my nightstand at night, keeps me informed of all calls and messages. Tried others they didn't work with my case cover on. This one has a adjustable knob to get the right fits to charge the phone. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Works great, even with a case
customer_reviews.text: Works great, even with a case! the adjustable lightning connector makes it possible to charge the iPhone without removing from virtually any case, (Otterbox Defender would be an exception)
customer_reviews.author: Vanleverans

customer_reviews.title: Charger Base
customer_reviews.text: The charger works well. I was a little disappointed in how "Tight" the plug fit was. It doesn't plug / unplug as easily as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to surface like the proverbial does to a blanket
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to surface like the proverbial does to a blanket, charges every time, and only because they sorted out the variable distance required from one phone case to another via clever up/down variable height adjustable lightning connector (works with the more bulky type of case).
customer_reviews.author: Julian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great. A little difficult to take the phone off
customer_reviews.text: Works great. A little difficult to take the phone off, so much so that it feels like I'm going to pop the lightning connector out of the socket but I assume that's not exactly a bad thing. The adhesive at the bottom is good enough so that it doesn't wiggle around at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Adams

customer_reviews.title: I phone 7 charger
customer_reviews.text: Husband is happy with it and it is working great with his phone
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Shields

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable or Stable
customer_reviews.text: It worked OK at first but broke within the first month and a half of purchase. Just outside of the return window but oh well. The little part that you have to screw backwards and forwards is very very finicky and frail. I do not recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Victor

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Returned for double charge stand. Needed capability to charge two phones at once.
customer_reviews.author: Charles V. Cocca

customer_reviews.title: Charges good but need work
customer_reviews.text: It’s charges good but the charger port does not stay up. So you have to fight to get the phone on the port. There is no way to tighten it. I thought the silver piece in the back did but it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: TDH

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars. I guess it would work, if ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars. I guess it would work, if you needed it too. But when you have the Otter box on your phone, it's not gonna "dock" at this station. Move along, pardner, cause if you wont to charge with this docking station, you have to take it apart. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after about a month. Spend a little more and get something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Charging stand
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this was great and a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Looks to fit several cases on any phone.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried quite a few of these, THIS IS THE ONE!!! I was extremely impressed by this product, once the height was set for my phone, it was ‘Plug-n-Play’ from then on. Wonderful design accompanied by sleek look makes this a winner in my book.
customer_reviews.author: DBall

customer_reviews.title: This works works exactly as promised. The only gripe ...
customer_reviews.text: This works works exactly as promised. The only gripe I have is that it takes some trial and error to align my phone port with the dock.....and that's more my problem than the dock itself.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Low quality, broke in 3 months. Pure garbage, cheap plastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product fast shipping I got it sooner than expected:)
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it because I don't have to plug a cord in to my phone to charge it . it seems to charge my phone as fast as plugging a cable in to it.
customer_reviews.author: ewald

customer_reviews.title: Seems solid but have to be careful when docked as ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems solid but have to be careful when docked as the roller doesn't have a large range of movement. Also needs two hands to dock and undock but that is more a reflection on the apple connection than the dock itself. Connects to USB power with a supplied micro USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley H.

customer_reviews.title: The Skinny
customer_reviews.text: This charger workers for the I-Phone 7. It is NOT wireless... It is a dock charger for your phone, is not user friendly to use while charging unless speaking on speaker phone. Do not feel like it is fast charging as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Heather schlager

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if it sat at an angle
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it works well with my wallet case. The cord is also long enough to reach the USB slot on my computer that's below my desk. However, I've taken a 2 stars off because of ergonomics. The phone sits nearly vertical in the dock, and the backrest is not adjustable. It would be better if it sat at an angle, so that its easier to type while its in the dock.
customer_reviews.author: BVC500

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with phone case
customer_reviews.text: The charger absolutely does not work with any kind of case on my I phone 7. Huge disappointment. Without the case it does work.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband - he loves it! So convenient to have this both charge and keep the phone visible. Great little item!

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied at all
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit well with a phone case on the phone and is not practical to remove it from the case every time you want to charge your phone. Great idea if it actually worked

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, very frustrating to connect your phone to it. I sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great charging station without the wires!! Bought it actually for my son and he loves it!!

customer_reviews.title: Good value Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up, adjustable, durable, good price for a great product. I will probably order a few more!

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to connect but seems to work well.

customer_reviews.title: I like this charger because it I versitle and should work ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a thin case for my iPhone 7 and bought this because my phone no longer fit my mophie charger. I like this charger because it I versitle and should work on just about any phone with this charging port because there are no constraints on phone width. The spacing between the bottom phone support and the end of the charger is also adjustable via a very cool metal wheel. The overall look is awesome. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Music Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find older Iphone surface chargers. This is a good hybrid that worked (with a little modification of the Otterbox) great. I was glad that it was adjustable to properly fit.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine but I have little trust in the integrity of ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is not listed as refurbished but showed up needing to be cleaned and clearly used. Seems to work fine but I have little trust in the integrity of s product I was already lied to about.

customer_reviews.title: Great for phones with cases.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with an iPhone 6s and iPhone 7 with two different cases. I love the repositionable adhesive base.

customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent charger for your phone. It adjust to fit any case.I would highly recommend getting them.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I'm very very happy and satisfied with my purchase and would definitely buy from this company again.

customer_reviews.text: very solid base. holds iphone7 very secure. the connector doesn't feel flimsy like other docking stations.

customer_reviews.text: The description says "the dock also allows the iPhone to sync with your computer using the built-in cable", but there was no cable built in nor one included in the box

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my mom and she absolutely loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Already broke. Only had 6 months! Was nice to have at bedside as it allowed me to see the screen. Really hard to slide into slot. Super bummed.

customer_reviews.title: Move on to another product
customer_reviews.text: Stay away, iPhone barely charges. Have to reseat every few mins to get to charge. No charge after overnight in dock.
customer_reviews.author: S. Repp

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my Iphone 7
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable charging port makes it easy for my phone to just sit on top of the charging dock and with its case still on. Although it does come with the USB port, it does not come with the adapter in order to be plugged into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Barron

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the plug wasn't so tight. I mean it's a stand. Not cord that one would want a snug plug. I love it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cod O Matic

LIGHTNING DOCK - compatible port ensures your iPhone is always juiced and ready to go
SLIM CASE COMPATIBLE - design allows the connector to reach the phone through most slim case designs
SYNC - the dock also allows the iPhone to sync with your computer using the built-in cable
